info.sourceTextContent:
Dej치ronlas al fin solas. Rezaron largo rato de rodillas. Cuando terminaron su rezo, Cecilia rog칩 a la monja que fuese a la cocina a dar orden para que se le hiciese te, porque estaba desfallecida.
En cuanto la monja sali칩, alz칩se vivamente.
info.suspiciousTextContent:
They left him alone at last. They prayed on their knees for a long time. When they finished their prayer, Cecilia asked the nun who went to the kitchen to give orders so that you do him, because he was faint.
As the nun left, alzose strongly
